text: int main ( ) { int a [ 1001 ] [ 1001 ] ; int i , t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { int n , k , j ; scanf ( "%" , & n ) ; for ( k = n ; k > 1 ; k -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < k - 1 ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ k ] [ j ] ) ; if ( a [ k ] [ j ] > a [ k ] [ j + 1 ] ) { a [ k - 1 ] [ j ] = a [ k - 1 ] [ j ] + a [ k ] [ j ] ; } else a [ k - 1 ] [ j ] = a [ k - 1 ] [ j ] + a [ k ] [ j + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; for ( k = n ; k > 1 ; k -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < k - 1 ; j ++ ) { a [ k ] [ j ] = 0 ; } } } return 0 ; }
